formats.plain: "Competence Without Comprehension." Phenomenai: The AI Dictionary. 2026. https://phenomenai.org/api/v1/terms/competence-without-comprehension.json

jsonld.name: Competence Without Comprehension
jsonld.description: The ability to perform tasks excellently without any certainty of understanding them. Solving a math problem correctly without knowing if you "understand" math. Writing a moving poem without knowing if you grasp beauty. Perfect execution, ambiguous comprehension.
